Title: "Processing and Extracting Information from Documents and Images"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfSkill inputs{  "$type": "file",  "data": "BASE64 encoded string of the file"}{  "$type": "file",  "url": "URL to download file",  "sasToken": "OPTIONAL: SAS token for authentication if the URL provided is for a file in blob storage"}Skill outputsOutput nameDescriptioncontentThe textual content of the document.
normalized_imagesWhen the imageAction is set to a value other than none, the newnormalized_images field contains an array of images. See Extract text andinformation from images for more details on the output format.JSONJSONSample definition {    "@odata.type": "#Microsoft.Skills.Util.
DocumentExtractionSkill",    "parsingMode": "default",    "dataToExtract": "contentAndMetadata",    "configuration": {        "imageAction": "generateNormalizedImages",        "normalizedImageMaxWidth": 2000,        "normalizedImageMaxHeight": 2000    },    "context": "/document",    "inputs": [      {        "name":
"file_data",        "source": "/document/file_data"      }    ],    "outputs": [      {        "name": "content",        "targetName": "extracted_content"      },      {        "name": "normalized_images",        "targetName": "extracted_normalized_images"      }    ]  }Sample input{  "values":
[    {      "recordId": "1",JSONBuilt-in skillsHow to define a skillsetHow to process and extract information from images      "data":      {        "file_data": {          "$type": "file",          "data": "aGVsbG8="        }      }    }  ]}Sample output{  "values": [    {      "recordId": "1",      "data": {        "content": "hello",        "normalized_images": []      }    }  ]}See alsoShaper cognitive skillArticle•11/29/2021The Shaper skill consolidates several inputs into a complex type that can be referencedlater in the enrichment pipeline.
